title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

title: Bambi
description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest with his friends Thumper the rabbit and Flower the skunk.

title: Mrs. Miniver
description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A musical portrait of composer/singer/dancer George M. Cohan. From his early days as a child-star in his family's vaudeville show up to the time of his comeback.

title: Now, Voyager
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A defiant daughter of a wealthy Boston family finds romance and independence when she breaks free from her domineering mother.

title: To Be or Not to Be
description: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: The Magnificent Ambersons
description: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

title: Cat People
description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: Woman of the Year
description: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Tess is named 'Woman of the Year'.

title: The Pride of the Yankees
description: The story of the life and career of the famous baseball player, Lou Gehrig.

title: This Gun for Hire
description: A quiet hitman becomes entangled with a nightclub singer and a treasonous plot involving poison gas.

title: The Palm Beach Story
description: A married woman leaves her husband in New York to find a rich man in Palm Beach, Florida, so she can finance his inventions.

title: Random Harvest
description: An amnesiac World War I veteran falls in love with a music hall star, only to regain his memory of his past life and forget her.

title: Talk of the Town
description: An escaped political prisoner and a stuffy law professor love the same woman.

title: Holiday Inn
description: At an inn which is open only on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.

title: The Major and the Minor
description: A broke woman disguises herself as a 12-year-old girl to get a half-price train ticket and ends up being taken in by a major.

title: Road to Morocco
description: Two castaways wash up on the shores of North Africa and get mixed up with an Arabian princess and a desert sheik.

title: The Glass Key
description: A corrupt political boss is accused of murder, and his right-hand man tries to clear him while navigating a complex web of deceit.

title: Across the Pacific
description: A cashiered army officer tracks an enemy agent onto a ship bound for the Panama Canal to stop a plot to blow up the locks.

title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
description: When a famous radio personality slips on the ice on the steps of a prominent Ohio family's home, he takes over their house and life while he recovers.

title: Gentleman Jim
description: The story of James J. Corbett, the bank clerk who became world heavyweight boxing champion in 1892.

title: Keeper of the Flame
description: A reporter investigates the death of a national hero and uncovers dark secrets about his life and political ambitions.

title: Reap the Wild Wind
description: In 1840, ship salvagers off the Florida Keys battle storms, giant squids, and each other for the cargo of wrecked vessels.

title: Kings Row
description: Five children grow up in a small Midwestern town at the turn of the century, facing tragedy, madness, and murder.

title: The Black Swan
description: A reformed pirate hunts down his former partners in crime while trying to woo a governor's daughter in 17th-century Jamaica.

title: Saboteur
description: A factory worker accused of sabotage goes on the run across the United States to find the real culprit and clear his name.

title: In Which We Serve
description: The story of a British naval ship, the HMS Torrin, from its construction to its sinking in the Battle of Crete, told through flashbacks by the survivors.

title: Desperate Journey
description: After their bomber crashes in Germany, an RAF flight crew tries to escape across Nazi territory to safety in the Netherlands.

title: The Flying Tigers
description: American volunteer pilots fight the Japanese in China before the US enters World War II.

title: My Gal Sal
description: The life of songwriter Paul Dresser, who leaves home to join a medicine show and eventually falls in love with a singer.

title: The Ghost of Frankenstein
description: Ygor resurrects Frankenstein's monster and brings him to the original doctor's son, hoping to have his own brain transplanted into the creature.

title: Moontide
description: A dockworker, prone to drunken blackouts, saves a suicidal woman and falls in love with her, but is manipulated by his jealous friend.

title: The Mummy's Tomb
description: The Mummy Kharis is brought to America by a high priest to kill the members of the Banning family who defiled the tomb of Princess Ananka.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Voice of Terror
description: Sherlock Holmes helps the British government track down a Nazi saboteur broadcasting terror threats over the radio.

title: Arabian Nights
description: The rightful Caliph of Baghdad fights to reclaim his throne from his evil brother with the help of a beautiful dancer and Ali Baba.

title: Captains of the Clouds
description: A cocky Canadian bush pilot joins the Royal Canadian Air Force to fight in World War II, but has trouble with discipline.

title: Reunion in France
description: A French woman discovers her fianc√© has collaborated with the Nazis, and she helps an American pilot escape from occupied Paris.

title: The Corpse Vanishes
description: A mad scientist kidnaps young brides and drains their glandular fluids to keep his ancient wife young.

title: Tales of Manhattan
description: An anthology film that follows a tailcoat as it passes from one owner to another, affecting each of their lives in different ways.

title: Spy Smasher
description: A masked vigilante battles a Nazi spy ring attempting to flood the United States with counterfeit money.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
description: Sherlock Holmes must protect the inventor of a new bomb sight from the Nazis and his nemesis, Professor Moriarty.

title: The Spoilers
description: In gold-rush Alaska, a saloon girl falls for a prospector, but a crooked gold commissioner schemes to steal his claim.

title: Wake Island
description: A dramatization of the heroic stand of a small garrison of US Marines against the overwhelming Japanese invasion of Wake Island in December 1941.

title: The Talk of the Town
description: An escaped political prisoner and a stuffy law professor love the same woman.
